items.title: Police watchdog may investigate force over Maccabi fan ban
items.description: The IOPC says it can exercise its investigatory power if warranted, after its director said she was willing to launch a probe.

items.title: King's Foundation chair and nominee peer admits 'misleading' doctorate claim
items.description: Dame Ann Limb tells the Sunday Times she did not complete a doctorate previously listed on her CV.

items.title: Labour MSP to quit Holyrood over links to sex offender
items.description: Pam Duncan-Glancy stood down as the party's education spokeswoman earlier this month after admitting a "serious error of judgement".

items.title: 'Hearts have arrived'...but McInnes warns they can get better
items.description: Hearts "have arrived" as Scottish Premiership title contenders after beating Rangers for the second time this season, says Kris Boyd.

items.title: Watch moment Robbie Williams surprises 94-year-old fan
items.description: The Rock DJ hitmaker made Humberston House Care Home resident Norma's dream come true.
